DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the wrinkle-reducing effects of 3.25-MHz radiofrequency (RF) energy delivered in 4 weekly applications to human periorbital skin area by grating pre- and 90-days post treatment photographs on the Fitzpatrick Wrinkle Severity Scale (FWSS) by three blinded evaluators.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of XP200 Radiofrequency Treatment of Wrinkles
